faq.question: Bug Generation
faq.answer: When you find a bug, please report to us with its description, time of generation, bug type, and whether it is recurring. Bugs that are deemed more serious are given higher priority. If you need to attach screenshots and other documentation, please use the community forums on our website. Responses may be delayed as we comfirm the report and conduct tests to solve the issue. Thank you for your understanding and patience.

faq.question: Bug Abuse
faq.answer: Please report any bugs to us immediately upon discovery, to help maintaining a smooth gaming environment for all players. Willful exploitation of bugs that can have significant impact on the server to gain unfair advantages or cause discomfort for others will be penalized according to the terms of service.
